emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Predictive Maintenance
emerging_technologies.description: Use of AI to predict equipment failures or maintenance needs before they occur, reducing downtime.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Increased efficiency and safety in industrial settings, potential job displacement in maintenance sectors.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Cost-effectiveness, reliability improvements, and integration with existing IoT systems.

emerging_technologies.name: Urban Air Mobility (UAM)
dependencies: Electric Vertical Take-Off and Landing (eVTOL) Vehicles
emerging_technologies.description: Implementation of flying taxis or drones for urban transport, reducing road congestion.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Altered city landscapes, new job opportunities in UAM operations, and changes in urban mobility patterns.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory approval, safety concerns, and infrastructure development for take-off and landing zones.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum Communication Networks
emerging_technologies.description: Quantum networks for secure communication, leveraging quantum entanglement for unbreakable encryption.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhanced security for critical infrastructure, potential shift in international relations due to encryption advancements.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High costs of implementation, need for quantum-compatible hardware, and international collaboration.

emerging_technologies.name: Brain-Computer Interfaces for Education
emerging_technologies.description: Non-invasive interfaces allowing for direct learning by interfacing with the brain's learning centers.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential to democratize education, ethical concerns about cognitive enhancement, privacy issues.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Ethical guidelines, user comfort, effectiveness in real-world educational settings.

emerging_technologies.name: Space-Based Solar Power
emerging_technologies.description: Collection of solar power in space and beaming it back to Earth for use.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: A potential clean energy solution, could alter geopolitical power dynamics, environmental impact considerations.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological challenges in space infrastructure, cost, and international cooperation.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Delivery Vehicles
mainstream_technologies.description: Fully autonomous vehicles designed for package delivery, reducing human intervention.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread in urban areas with regulatory support; integration with existing logistics networks.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Personalized Healthcare
mainstream_technologies.description: Use of AI to tailor medical treatments and health monitoring to individual genetic profiles.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming standard in developed countries, with insurance and healthcare systems adapting to personalized medicine.

epoch_themes.description: Integration of multiple technologies leading to synergistic advancements.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Increased efficiency and personalized experiences, but also complex societal adjustments and potential job displacement.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Shift towards technology-driven economies, focus on digital literacy, and new forms of work.

epoch_themes.description: A surge in space technology and exploration, driven by both public and private sectors.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: New opportunities for resource utilization, changes in global energy distribution, and new international space laws.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased investment in space, space tourism, and potential colonization efforts.
